content:
Craft an item of type: acacia_slab
inventory=[{"type": "infested_cobblestone", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "red_concrete_powder", "quantity": 41, "index": 20}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 20, "index": 28}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 54, "index": 30}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft an acacia slab, I need to craft acacia planks. Acacia planks require 1 acacia log. Therefore, I will move the acacia log from slot 43 to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: acacia_slab
inventory=[{"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "infested_cobblestone", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "red_concrete_powder", "quantity": 41, "index": 20}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 20, "index": 28}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 54, "index": 30}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the acacia planks, I will move them from the craft slot (0) to an open inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: acacia_slab
inventory=[{"type": "infested_cobblestone", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "red_concrete_powder", "quantity": 41, "index": 20}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 20, "index": 28}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 54, "index": 30}]
thought: To craft an acacia_slab, I need to place 3 acacia_planks in the first row of the crafting grid. The acacia_planks are located at slot 11, so I will move them to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: acacia_slab
inventory=[{"type": "acacia_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "infested_cobblestone", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "red_concrete_powder", "quantity": 41, "index": 20}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 20, "index": 28}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 54, "index": 30}]
thought: Now I need to place another acacia_planks in the second slot of the first row of the crafting grid. The acacia_planks are located at slot 11, so I will move them to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: acacia_slab
inventory=[{"type": "acacia_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "infested_cobblestone", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "red_concrete_powder", "quantity": 41, "index": 20}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 20, "index": 28}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 54, "index": 30}]
thought: Finally, I need to place another acacia_planks in the third slot of the first row of the crafting grid. The acacia_planks are located at slot 11, so I will move them to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: acacia_slab
inventory=[{"type": "acacia_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "infested_cobblestone", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "red_concrete_powder", "quantity": 41, "index": 20}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 20, "index": 28}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 54, "index": 30}]
thought: Now I can craft the acacia_slabs by moving them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 6
